items.title: Babbo Italian Eatery
items.intro: Serving some of the best Italian food in the state, Babbo Italian Eatery is a place locals visit to satisfy their Italian cuisine cravings.
items.description: Head here to enjoy their pizza and pasta selections, from traditional spaghetti and meatballs to sweet roasted pear and grape pizza. Either way, you’ll enjoy dining at this popular restaurant.

items.title: Brookside II Sports Bar and Grille
items.intro: Brookside II Sports Bar and Grille offers classic bar favorites from wings to burgers. Grab a seat and enjoy more than 50 TVs, along with multiple pool tables, dart boards and off-track betting.
items.description: Brookside II Sports Bar and Grille offers classic bar favorites from wings to burgers. Grab a seat and enjoy more than 50 TVs, along with multiple pool tables, dart boards and off-track betting.

items.title: Handel's Homemade Ice Cream
items.intro: Not only will you find traditional flavors here, you'll also find deliciously unique seasonal mixes such as Snappy Turtle or Peanut Butter & Jelly, along with vegan, sherbet and dairy-free options.
items.description: Not only will you find traditional flavors here, you'll also find deliciously unique seasonal mixes such as Snappy Turtle or Peanut Butter & Jelly, along with vegan, sherbet and dairy-free options.

items.title: Hot Bagels & Deli
items.intro: Hot Bagels & Deli offers a huge selection of fresh bagels and cream cheese flavors. You can also find breads paired with top quality meats and classic deli sides.
items.description: Hot Bagels & Deli offers a huge selection of fresh bagels and cream cheese flavors. You can also find breads paired with top quality meats and classic deli sides.

items.title: Irish Wolfhound
items.intro: Irish Wolfhound Pub provides visitors a traditional Irish menu along with your favorite Irish beers.
items.description: You can enjoy good food and drink alongside the many big screen TVs – perfect for any sports fan!

items.title: My Daddy's Italian Bakery and Café
items.intro: Founded in Surprise by a New York transplant, this bakery offers sandwich cookies, strawberry cheese croissants, donuts, cream pies and cheesecakes. We dare you to leave with just one box of sweet treats!
items.description: Founded in Surprise by a New York transplant, this bakery offers sandwich cookies, strawberry cheese croissants, donuts, cream pies and cheesecakes. We dare you to leave with just one box of sweet treats!

items.title: Best Western Plus Surprise-Phoenix NW
items.intro: Enjoy spacious rooms and free hot breakfast at the Best Western Plus Surprise-Phoenix NW hotel.
items.description: If you are looking for a great night's rest in a desirable location, book your stay at the Best Western Plus Surprise-Phoenix NW. We're close to great restaurants and shopping, and less than 10 minutes from the Surprise Stadium and only 20 minutes from Sun City Grand, the State Farm Stadium and Gila River Arena in Glendale.

items.title: Comfort Inn & Suites Surprise
items.intro: Experience all the amenities you need at the pet-friendly Comfort Inn & Suites Surprise. Enjoy the cocktail hour, free hot breakfast, free WiFi, an indoor heated pool and a sundeck.
items.description: Experience all the amenities you need at the pet-friendly Comfort Inn & Suites Surprise. Enjoy the cocktail hour, free hot breakfast, free WiFi, an indoor heated pool and a sundeck. Plus, you can depend on Comfort Inn for affordable, comfortable rooms and all the amenities you expect. All of the rooms have a TV, microwave, refrigerator, coffee maker, hair dryer, iron and ironing board. The hotel offers access to guest laundry facilities, copy machines and a meeting room for business tasks..

items.title: Days Inn & Suites by Wyndham Surprise
items.intro: Days Inn & Suites by Wyndham Surprise offers king suites as well as Jacuzzi suites, non-smoking and accessible rooms.
items.description: Days Inn & Suites by Wyndham Surprise offers king suites as well as Jacuzzi suites, non-smoking and accessible rooms. Enjoy the heated outdoor pool and 24-hour front reception service from the multilingual staff. The hotel also offers free WiFi, 37-inch plasma TVs, a free daily newspaper, free parking, guest laundry facilities and a business center. Each hotel room features a microwave and a refrigerator as well as Serta pillow-top mattresses.

items.title: Hampton Inn & Suites Phoenix-Surprise
items.intro: The Hampton Inn & Suites Phoenix-Surprise hotel is located across the street from the Banner Del E. Webb Medical Center, and within walking distance to several restaurants and shops.
items.description: Find everything you expect from a great value hotel in Phoenix-Surprise and a few unexpected delights you just might not. Make yourself comfortable in a warm and inviting guest room or suite with free high-speed internet access, a handy lap desk, and a clean and fresh Hampton bed. Each morning, you can enjoy Hampton’s free hot breakfast or a tasty Hampton On the Run Breakfast Bag, available Monday to Friday. Host a meeting or special event for up to 150 guests in the versatile function space and stay connected at the business center. Wind down after hectic days with a refreshing dip in the outdoor pool or a stress-relieving workout in the fitness center.

items.title: Hilton Garden Inn Surprise
items.intro: Hilton Garden Inn features complimentary WI-Fi and a 24-hour Business Center, complimentary fitness center, pool and a full-service restaurant on the property, providing everything you need to make your stay successful.
items.description: Hilton Garden Inn features complimentary WI-Fi and a 24-hour Business Center, complimentary fitness center, pool and a full-service restaurant on the property, providing everything you need to make your stay successful.

items.title: Holiday Inn Express & Suites Surprise
items.intro: The Holiday Inn Express Surprise is located next door to the Surprise Stadium, home of the Texas Rangers and Kansas City Royals Spring Training. Outdoor enthusiasts can enjoy some of Phoenix’s top-rated golf courses and miles of hiking & bike trails just minutes from the hotel.
items.description: The Holiday Inn Express Surprise is located next door to the Surprise Stadium, home of the Texas Rangers and Kansas City Royals Spring Training. Outdoor enthusiasts can enjoy some of Phoenix’s top-rated golf courses and miles of hiking & bike trails just minutes from the hotel. The hotel is conveniently located near the University of Phoenix Stadium, home of the Arizona Cardinals, Gila River Arena and ISM Raceway. The Holiday Inn Express Surprise is a smart choice for corporate travelers visiting Banner Health, the Toyota and Ford Proving Grounds, and Luke Air Force Base.
